solution_line_template: Kai has put out {doug_fires} x {kai_multiplier} = <<{doug_fires}*{kai_multiplier}={kai_fires}>>{kai_fires} fires for the week.
Eli has put out {kai_fires} / {eli_divisor} = <<{kai_fires}/{eli_divisor}={eli_fires}>>{eli_fires} fires for the week.
Therefore, the total amount of fires they have put out over the entire week was {doug_fires} + {kai_fires} + {eli_fires} = <<{doug_fires}+{kai_fires}+{eli_fires}={total_fires}>>{total_fires}.
